DbfEngine - A Java API to read, write xBase (DBASE, Foxpro dbf files).

See:
          Description

Packages
ru.smartflex.tools.dbf Provides API for reading and writing xBase files (dbf format).
ru.smartflex.tools.dbf.mem Provides API for reading .mem files (Foxpro and Clipper .mem format).
ru.smartflex.tools.dbf.test Presents samples for .dbf and .mem operations (All tests were created for Foxpro 2.6)

 

DbfEngine - A Java API to read, write xBase (DBASE, Foxpro dbf files). Also API allows read memory files (.mem) of Foxpro and may be Clipper.

This API is pure lightweight library without memory consumption and any third party libraries. There are no java loggers and modern mappers. The DBF Java API is intended as engine for data exchange purposes.

The DbfEngine is used in smart-flex.ru project
